DOC.brief_summary: The study design compare effect BI 425809 compare placebo patient cognitive impairment due Alzheimer 's Disease .
DOC.brief_title: BI 425809 Patients With Cognitive Impairment Due Alzheimer 's Disease .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients early sign dementia Alzheimer Type Male female patient age least 55 year Concomitant use acetylcholinesterase inhibitor ( AChEIs ) allow require . Patients currently take AChEIs eligible long use stable dose least 3 month prior screen change foreseen duration study . This dose must consistent product label concerned country . Patients currently take AChEIs take past also eligible AChEIs stop least 3 month prior screen . Patients must least 6 year formal education fluency test language verbally confirm patient document study investigator . Patients must reliable study partner ( per investigator judgement , instance family member , partner etc. , guardian ) Further inclusion criterion apply Exclusion criterion : Cognitive impairment dementia etiology Alzheimer 's Dementia ( AD ) Substantial concomitant cerebrovascular disease ( defined history stroke / intracranial haemorrhagia ) temporally relate onset worsen cognitive impairment per investigator judgement Medical history diagnosis symptomatic unstable/uncontrolled condition per investigator judgement Patients receive prescribed drug treatment dementia Alzheimer Type ( Acetylcholine Esterase Inhibitors ) screen within 3 month prior screen Previous participation investigational drug study mild cognitive impairment/AD within three month prior screen . Having receive active treatment study target disease modification AD like AÃŸ immunization tau therapy . Previous participation study nonprescription medication , vitamin nutritional formulation allow . Clinically significant uncompensated hearing loss judgment investigator . Use hearing aid allow . Further exclusion criterion apply
